name: Home Style Chicken Packets
ingredients: 2 medium zucchini, sliced about 1/4-1/2" thick, 14 ounces
2-3 green onions, cut in 1" pieces, optional
utensils: 9 x 13" glass baking pan (for alternate method)

instructions.en: Put 1 chicken breast in the center of each piece of foil.
Season both sides of the chicken with salt, pepper, and desired herbs and spices.
Cover the chicken with sliced mushrooms, zucchini, and green onions (if using). Season vegetables to taste.
Place pats of butter on top of the vegetables.
Fold up the foil to form packets, leaving room for circulation.

notes: This recipe makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. An alternate method is provided for baking in a glass pan.

alternateMethod.en: Spray a 9 x 13" glass baking pan with cooking spray.
Place the 4 chicken breasts in the pan and season both sides.
Cover with vegetables and season to taste.
Place pats of butter on top of the vegetables.
Cover the pan with heavy foil.
Bake at 450째F (230째C) for 30-35 minutes, or until the chicken is done.
